original_text: Moses said to the men of Reuben and Gad, ‘The other Israelite tribes will go across the river to fight against the people who live there. It is not fair that you should stay here!
korean_text: 모세가 갓 자손과 르우벤 자손에게 이르되 너희 형제들은 싸우러 가거늘 너희는 여기 앉아 있고자 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Moses said to the men of Reuben and Gad
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 르우벤 지파와 갓 지파 사람들에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: The other Israelite tribes will go across the river
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 이스라엘 지파들은 강을 건너갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: to fight against the people who live there
